history.proof: intros a b q r H1 H2. apply gcdZ_is_gcdZ. srun best use: gcdZ_correct, gcd_mod.

original: intros a b q r H1 H2. apply gcdZ_is_gcdZ. apply is_gcdZ_sind. - intros b0. apply gcd_OZ. - intros b0 a0 d q0 r0 H3 H4 H5 IH. apply gcd_mod; auto. apply divexZ; auto. apply (proj1 H5). apply (proj1 (proj2 H5)). apply (proj1 (proj2 (proj2 H5))). symmetry. apply H4.
